name: Digital Abstract: Memories ; beta / early access
name_original: Digital Abstract: Memories ; beta / early access
description:
An experimental study of digital abstract art , photography, music, and non objective interaction  determined by the user. 

how to play:___________________________________________________________________________
use buttons on gamepad controller with a xbox 360 or newer layout to play  I used an 8bitdo sn90 prp controller
